data.event: BYESVILLE -- Firefighters are searching for the cause of a blaze Monday morning that heavily damaged an Indian Lake Road residence approximately 14 months after a house at that same address was destroyed by fire.

event.title: approximately 14 months after a house at that same address was destroyed

data.event: BYESVILLE -- Firefighters are searching for the cause of a blaze Monday morning that heavily damaged an Indian Lake Road residence approximately 14 months after a house at that same address was destroyed by fire.
A 2006 Dodge Dakota truck parked in the garage was also heavily damaged.

event.title: January 2008, a fire at a home at that same location destroyed

data.event: In January 2008, a fire at a home at that same location destroyed the residence and injured a neighbor, who later succumbed to his injuries.
